title: Joe Biden, Trade & Border Security
itunes:title: Joe Biden, Trade & Border Security
description:
Kevin spoke with Mattie Dupler, Senior Fellow at the National Taxpayers Union and former Former Coalitions Director for the House Republican Conference and Robert Shapiro, Chairman of Sonecon and Senior Economic Advisor Democratic presidential candidates including Presidents Bill Clinton and Barack Obama. They discussed Joe Biden accusations, border security, the Fed, and U.S.-China trade talks.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
